proc toSVG(p: Vec; annotate: static[char] = 'n';
           style: Option[string] = none(string)): XmlNode
Generate svg circle at position p and possibly annotate it with coordinates. Coordinate annotation is controlled using annoate and can take several values ('n' for no annotation, 'r' and 'l' for right and left respectively)   Source   Edit
